title: Moekare wa Orange-iro
original_name: モエカレはオレンジ色
sinopse: Asaki had to be transferred to another school because of the death of her father. Unable to adapt to this new environment while smoking on the roof of the school, she is surprised by a fireman man in charge of a fire drill... As if his shame was not enough, the same boy will have to save her life again?
